src.stt.wav2vec2_training module¶

Description:

Training script for the Wav2vec2 model

Usage:

$ python src/data/wav2vec2_training.py -s

Possible arguments:

  • -s or –save: Save the data

src.stt.wav2vec2_training.load_model(processor: Wav2Vec2Processor, device: device) → Wav2Vec2ForCTC¶

Load the model

Parameters:

  • processor (Wav2Vec2Processor) – Processor to use

  • device (torch.device) – Torch device

Returns:

Model to use

Return type:

Wav2Vec2ForCTC
